body: Hi. I made an account just to say this: You are freakin amazing at what you do! Also, please make more Mega Man Star Force! Like, a lot more!!! Thank you again!!! Keep it up!

@bongocongo And who fucking doesn't?
Also, about 20 doujins of this ship and only one got translated in english? This is fucking bullshit!!

How many doujins is that?
holy shit this artist really wants to fuck luna

Pude llegar a hablar con el autor en twitter de estos mangas y animarle a hacer más Mangas sobre megaman le decía que sus dibujos eran hermosos xD recomiendo ir a su Twitter y animarle quién sabe tal vez insistimos haga otro por favor que haga otro. XD

I never thought I'd see a new Mega Man Star Force doujin at this point, but then, this artist has pretty much done these and almost nothing else, so... Anyways, it's great to finally see the various outfits Luna wears in the anime see some love. Bless you Heriyama.
